mapper.sql: SUMMARY_NUM, CURR_PERI, STATUS, PARTY_ID, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, OVERDUE_DATE, REPAY_DATE, RCV_PRN, PAD_UP_PRN, RCV_NOR_ITR, PAD_UP_NOR_ITR, RCV_DFT_ITR, PAD_UP_DFT_ITR, RCV_PNS_ITR, PAD_UP_PNS_ITR, DFT_OTD_ITR, OVERDUE_CAPI, OVERDUE_ITR, OVERDUE_PNS_ITR, USER_NUM, ORG_NUM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARK
mapper.select: select a.party_id, d.party_num partyNum, d.party_name partyName, c.contract_num contractNum, a.summary_num, a.overdue_capi+a.overdue_itr + a.overdue_pns_itr + a.dft_otd_itr as yqAmt, to_char(a.overdue_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') overdue_date, to_char(a.repay_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') repay_date, a.remark, a.user_num, a.org_num from tb_loan_illegal_record a, tb_loan_summary b, tb_con_contract_info c, tb_csm_party d where a.summary_num = b.summary_num and b.contract_id = c.contract_id and a.party_id = d.party_id and a.party_id = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_LOAN_ILLEGAL_RECORD (SUMMARY_NUM, CURR_PERI, STATUS, PARTY_ID, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, OVERDUE_DATE, REPAY_DATE, RCV_PRN, PAD_UP_PRN, RCV_NOR_ITR, PAD_UP_NOR_ITR, RCV_DFT_ITR, PAD_UP_DFT_ITR, RCV_PNS_ITR, PAD_UP_PNS_ITR, DFT_OTD_ITR, OVERDUE_CAPI, OVERDUE_ITR, OVERDUE_PNS_ITR, USER_NUM, ORG_NUM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARK) values (#{summaryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currPeri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{overdueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rcvPrn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{padUpPrn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rcvNorItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{padUpNorItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rcvDftItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{padUpDftItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rcvPnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{padUpPnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dftOtdItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{overdueCapi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{overdueItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{overduePnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into TB_LOAN_ILLEGAL_RECORD
SUMMARY_NUM,
CURR_PERI,
STATUS,
PARTY_ID,
BEGIN_DATE,
END_DATE,
OVERDUE_DATE,
REPAY_DATE,
RCV_PRN,
PAD_UP_PRN,
RCV_NOR_ITR,
PAD_UP_NOR_ITR,
RCV_DFT_ITR,
PAD_UP_DFT_ITR,
RCV_PNS_ITR,
PAD_UP_PNS_ITR,
DFT_OTD_ITR,
OVERDUE_CAPI,
OVERDUE_ITR,
OVERDUE_PNS_ITR,
USER_NUM,
ORG_NUM,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
REMARK,

#{currPeri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{padUpNorItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rcvDftItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{padUpDftItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rcvPnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{padUpPnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dftOtdItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update TB_LOAN_ILLEGAL_RECORD
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_DATE = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OVERDUE_DATE = #{overdueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REPAY_DATE = #{repayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RCV_PRN = #{rcvPrn,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAD_UP_PRN = #{padUpPrn,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RCV_NOR_ITR = #{rcvNorItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAD_UP_NOR_ITR = #{padUpNorItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RCV_DFT_ITR = #{rcvDftItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAD_UP_DFT_ITR = #{padUpDftItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RCV_PNS_ITR = #{rcvPnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAD_UP_PNS_ITR = #{padUpPnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DFT_OTD_ITR = #{dftOtdItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_CAPI = #{overdueCapi,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_ITR = #{overdueItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_PNS_ITR = #{overduePnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NUM = #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SUMMARY_NUM = #{summaryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CURR_PERI = #{currPeri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_LOAN_ILLEGAL_RECORD set STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGIN_DATE = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OVERDUE_DATE = #{overdueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REPAY_DATE = #{repayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RCV_PRN = #{rcvPrn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAD_UP_PRN = #{padUpPrn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RCV_NOR_ITR = #{rcvNorItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAD_UP_NOR_ITR = #{padUpNorItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RCV_DFT_ITR = #{rcvDftItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAD_UP_DFT_ITR = #{padUpDftItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RCV_PNS_ITR = #{rcvPnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAD_UP_PNS_ITR = #{padUpPnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DFT_OTD_ITR = #{dftOtdItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVERDUE_CAPI = #{overdueCapi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVERDUE_ITR = #{overdueItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVERDUE_PNS_ITR = #{overduePnsItr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NUM = #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SUMMARY_NUM = #{summaryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CURR_PERI = #{currPeri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
